trans-unit.source: Controls the deceleration of a resizing manipulation during inertia.
The InertiaExpansionBehavior class specifies how a expansion manipulation behaves when it is inertia.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting> event to do the following: - Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
- Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> property.
- Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
Set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> if it has a value.
For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the rate that resizing slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per square milliseconds.
Use the DesiredDeceleration property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia.
Set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> or the DesiredDeceleration, but not both.
When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> if it has a value.
For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The rate that resizing slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per square milliseconds.
The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.
The property is set to infinity.
-or- The property is set to <xref:System.Double>.
Gets or sets the amount the element resizes at the end of inertia.
Use the DesiredExpansion property to specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends.
Set either the DesiredExpansion or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> if it has a value.
For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The amount the element resizes at the end of inertia.

The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X*> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y*> properties set to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
Gets or sets the initial average radius.
For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The initial average radius.
Gets or sets the initial rate the element resizes at the start of inertia.
For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The initial rate the element resizes at the start of inertia.
